name: Frankenbeans
description:
This game was made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 46. This was my first ever Ludum Dare and it was just me working on it. The theme was "keep it alive" so play as two beans trying to keep Dr. BBQ's giant hotdog alive! You can play it with a friend, but it's intended to be a tough experience for one player.

https://ldjam.com/
